naming_formulas.description: Global Brand License + 'by' + Brand + Style Name + Apparel Style + Product Type + (Clothing Size Group)

summary: The document outlines the product naming guidelines for children's apparel, specifically focusing on the naming structure for both standard children's apparel and multipacks.
